collection_holder_name: University of Oregon Special Collections and University Archives
pageContext.collection_description: Collection comprises 135 15-minute episodes of Freedom Story, a radio program produced by Spiritual Mobilization, Inc., from 1951 to 1956. The programs feature dramatizations on conservative and libertarian themes and commentary.
collectionFormats: Digital audio file (including MP3, WAV, AIFF, etc.)
physical_formats: Digital audio file (including MP3, WAV, AIFF, etc.)
